casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Robert A. SCHACHTER. D-2828. Supreme Court of the United States June 29, 2015.

Opinion

Robert A. Schachter, of Valley Cottage, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
